```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(colorspace)
library(ggthemes)
library(extrafont)
font_import()
loadfonts(device="win")
fonts()
```


```{r load_data}
# Filme von 1970 bis 2020, wenig Informationen pro Film
raw_bechdel <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/raw_bechdel.csv')
# Filme von 1970 bis 2013, viele Informationen, viele Informationen pro Film

movies <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/movies.csv') %>% 
  separate_rows(genre, sep = ", ")
```


```{r}



movies %>%
  filter(genre != "NA") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = reorder(genre, genre, function(x) length(x))) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 800), breaks = c(0, 200, 400, 600, 800)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto", face="bold", size=12)) +
  labs(title = "Welche Genres sind am häufigsten vertreten?") +
  NULL -> abb1

#action adventure thriller

movies %>%
  filter(genre != "NA") %>% 
  filter(genre %in% c("Action", "Adventure", "Thriller", "Drama", "Comedy")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = reorder(genre, genre, function(x) length(x)), fill = binary) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  coord_flip() +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 400), breaks = c(0, 200, 400)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto", face="bold", size=12)) +
  labs(title = "Top 5 Genres: Bechdel Test",
       subtitle = "Der Bechdel Test ist öfter fehlgeschlagen",
       fill = "") +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(FAIL= "#D55E00", PASS = "#56B4E9")
  ) +
  NULL -> abb2



movies %>% 
  filter(genre != "NA") %>% 
  filter(genre %in% c("Action", "Adventure", "Thriller", "Drama", "Comedy")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year,
      fill = binary) +
  facet_grid(~genre) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL) +
  #scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 400), breaks = c(0, 200, 400)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto", face="bold", size=12)) +
  labs(title = "Genre-Häufigkeit in Abhängigkeit vom Bechdel Test über die Zeit",
       subtitle = "Das Genre 'Drama' hat den höchsten Zuwachs erhalten",
       fill = "") +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(FAIL= "#D55E00", PASS = "#56B4E9")
  ) +
  NULL -> abb3

```



```{r}
library(patchwork)

(abb1 + abb2) / abb3 +
  plot_annotation(title = "Filmgenres und Bechdel Test")

```




```{r}
hcl_palettes(type = "qualitative", plot = T, n = 9)
hcl_palettes("sequential (multi-hue)", n = 7, plot = TRUE)
```



```{r}
movies %>% ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  as.numeric(intgross)) +
  geom_point() -> plot_1

movies %>% ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  as.numeric(domgross), group = year) +
  geom_boxplot() -> plot_2

library(patchwork)

(plot_1 + plot_2) / plot_2 +
  plot_annotation(title = "My work")
```
